short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows easy copying and pasting of Math Academy questions, answers, explanations, and tutorials

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a "Copy" button to Math Academy that will allow easy copying and pasting into notes or asking AI assistants like ChatGPT.
